  • Method Details

    • customerRegistration

      boolean customerRegistration(GymCustomer customer)
      Registers a new customer in the FlipFit gym system.
      Parameters:
      customer - the GymCustomer object representing the customer to be registered
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful, false otherwise

    • gymOwnerRegistration

      boolean gymOwnerRegistration(GymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new gym owner in the FlipFit gym system.
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - the GymOwner object representing the gym owner to be registered
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful, false otherwise

    • registration

      int registration(User user)
      Registers a new user in the FlipFit gym system.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the user to be registered
      Returns:
      the user ID if the registration is successful, -1 otherwise

    • login

      int login(String username, String password)
      Logs in a user to the FlipFit gym system.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      the user ID if the login is successful, -1 otherwise

    • getUser

      User getUser(int userId)
      Retrieves the user object for the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the User object representing the user, or null if the user is not found

    • getUserRole

      RoleType getUserRole(int userId)
      Retrieves the role type of the user with the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the RoleType enum representing the role of the user, or null if the user is not found

    • updatePassword

      boolean updatePassword(String userName, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of the user with the given username.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the user
      newPassword - the new password to be set
      Returns:
      true if the password update is successful, false otherwise
